name: Mondrian Crossing - New tableau
description:
Someone drew using MS paint all over Mondrian's new tableau! We'll have to clean that up!

Create your own rectangles at will to use them as platforms, and use physics to your advantage!

Interact with the different colors  to get different results, from higher jumps to a reversed gravity.

Includes: 
  • 8 levels, each centered around a specific idea
  • A bonus level for people who want more challenge
  • Fullsreen/windowed mode
  • A  timer for speedruns
  • Sounds and particle effects
Challenges respected:
  • Only use the default MS Paint color palette
  • Use only comic sans for any in-game font
  • Draw your assets without a drawing tablet
  • Make the title/logo without any real type/font.
Tips:
  • You can draw a rectangle and hold it until you jump, so it's ready just when you need it
  • You can remove the rectangles you made with right click
  • You can cancel slow motion by pressing down
  • F11 will set fullscreen
  • F5 will restart

Game by: Octave Mortain (HowealTankaa), Pierre Fournier (Terpy), Eloi Mortain (Elowah)
